videos.title: Why Index Funds Are Winning in 2025 | Every Indian Investor Must Watch #jioblackrock #mutualfunds
videos.description:
In this episode of the Index Fund Sahi Hai podcast, we dive into the critical question: Why do so many Indians opt for active mutual funds over index funds? Joined by Suraj Ravindran, Founder and CEO of Index Fund Sahi Hai, we explore the power of data-driven investing, the underperformance of active mutual funds as highlighted in the SPIVA India Scorecard (https://www.spglobal.com/spdji/en/documents/spiva/spiva-india-scorecard-year-end-2024.pdf), and the low costs and diversification benefits of index funds. Suraj also discusses Nobel Prize-winning research behind passive investing and why awareness about index funds remains low in India.

 For more insights, check out the Nifty Passive Insights Quarterly Update (https://www.niftyindices.com/Nifty_Passive_Insights/Nifty%20Passive%20Insights%20Quarterly%20update%20-%20January%20to%20March%202024.pdf). 

Tune in to learn why index funds could be a game-changer for your investments!

videos.title: Budget 2024 Outlook - A Positive Budget for Bharat
videos.description:
Recently, the Government of India has presented the Budget for FY 2024-25.

Amidst anguish among a certain class of people, the budget maintains an overall positive outlook for Bharat‚Äôs Growth Journey.

Appropriate allocation has been done into infrastructure, defence & social schemes to ensure inclusion.

There are some changes in the Tax Rates related to Long/Short Term Capital Gains however, the difference is not stark. 

Removal of the indexation benefit from Capital Gains on Property can be seen as a concern, only if the investment horizon is not long-term there.

Sooraj, founder of Index Funds Sahi Hai has shared his opinion on Budget 2024 explaining a positive growth path¬†for¬†Bharat.
